title: [10pt] Localization Research
body: Research localization best practices and available Unity3D tools.

title: [10pt] Localization Design
body: Create a localization design to enable translating KOC into multiple Native languages

title: [20pt] Localization Framework
body: Create localization code framework to handle changing language in-game

title: [10pt] Game Script Content Manager
body: Create and manage a comprehensive game script for translation purposes

title: [20pt] Project Management
body: Ultimately drive the completion of the effort and communicate about the status clearly and proactively

title: [10pt] Direction
body: Offer direction to task assignees and clarify any pending questions
